t: Alex Apparel Holdings, Inc. - Bluehenge Capital Partners
s: March 12, 2025 - Alex Apparel is a designer and distributor of women’s apparel, specializing in branded women’s social occasion evening wear. It is a multi-channel retailer, predominately selling through large department stores such as Macy’s, Dillard’s, Nordstrom; as well as online and discount retailers such as TJ Maxx and Amazon...
January 5, 2025 - Alex Evenings - Internet first brand of casual apparel wear for women. Acquired by Versa Capital. Raised funding over 1 round from 1 investor.
